meanings.definition: A small fruit or seed contained within a larger fruit.
meanings.sent1: The apple had tiny fruitlets inside it.
meanings.sent2: The bunch of grapes was full of sweet fruitlets.
meanings.sent3: The fruitlets in the watermelon were having a party!
meanings.sent4: Her necklace of fruitlets sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The fruitlets burst with flavor when bitten into.

meanings.definition: A small, individual fruit that is part of a larger cluster or group.
meanings.sent1: She picked a few fruitlets from the strawberry plant.
meanings.sent2: The pineapple had many fruitlets growing on it.
meanings.sent3: The fruitlets in the fruit salad were the life of the party!
meanings.sent4: The fruitlets on the tree looked like colorful jewels.
meanings.sent5: The fruitlets added a burst of color to the garden.
